attributes.action: Ensure that funding remains available to ensure Members of Parliament are able to publicize the availability of Veterans Badges and the proposed Free Travel for Veterans ALL over the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are petitioning to ensure that funding remains available to ensure Members of Parliament are able to publicise the availability of Veterans Badges. We further petition The Prime Minister with regards to ensure the Free Travel for ALL Veterans within U.K. materializes is and is not merely a Vote grabbing gimmick. In this forth coming election year, we would remind the Prime Minister of the number of H. M. Forces Veterans and the dependants thats are ALL registered to Vote in the next General Election.

The Scottish Veterans Association have been advised by one such M.P.'s Office that the Government have now frozen monies available for such purposes. So for Members of Parliament to be able to promote these Badges and the proposals for Free Travel within the U.K. for ALL H. M. Forces Veterans, the money must come of the individual Members pockets.
